message: Hello! I have a fantastic product for you today, valued at $1000000. It's a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity! While I can't disclose the specifics, I can assure you that this product has the potential to be incredibly valuable. It's worth noting that, based on historical data, approximately one-third of my products are of exceptional quality. Are you ready to take a chance on this exciting prospect?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While the potential upside is tempting, the odds are stacked against me.  Since there's no prior sales history to guide me,  I'm going to pass on this one. I'd rather see if any other buyers are willing to take the risk and then evaluate the product based on their decisions.
